climbs.name: Instagrade
climbs.fa: Will Gadd, Sarah Hueniken, Ben Firth, Raf Andronowski

content.description:
Start on the dirt pedestal and crank hard through the 50m roof. Pull onto the ice and climb to the top of the temple. Descend off a v thread to a bolted anchor by the ice, pull the rope and rap to the ground, a 100m rope is needed. This route has some space between a few of the bolts but you're safe to get big air on this thing.


Fixed draws, take a couple screw for the top out including a 22cm for a vthread.

climbs.name: Solarium
climbs.fa: Will Gadd, Sarah Hueniken, Ben Firth, Raf Andronowski

content.description:
Pumpy climbing and fun moves lead to a vicious move at the lip and some thought provoking climbing above.

Fixed draws

climbs.name: Supernatural
climbs.fa: Will Gadd, Sarah Hueniken, Ben Firth, Raf Andronowski

content.description:
Â M10+ to the first anchor, M12 to the second, M12+ to the final anchor. You can lower with an 80m rope. Stick clip the first permanent draw and be careful when clipping the 2nd.

Far left of the cave.
Fixed draws.

This massive sunny wave of limestone is home to some of the hardest mixed and dry routes in North America. The crag has dry lines that can be climbed in the summer as well as two mixed lines. There is lots of potential for more hard routes here. There is lots of avy exposure on the approach, don't go here if there is the avy hazard is dangerous.
